string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: SALES AND DISTRIBUTION FEEDBACK
Choice of merchandise
Rate the price of the T shirts
Rate the design of the T shirts
Overall ambience of the stalls
HOSPITALITY FEEDBACK
Were your event related queries answered satisfactorily in the Hospitality desk?
How was the crowd control at hospitality desk?
Clarity of announcements
Were you able to locate direction for venues?
How do you rate the accommodation provided?
Clarity of information provided
How comfortable do you rate the registration process?
Over all Shaastra experience
DESIGN FEEDBACK FORM
Rate the Website Design
How informative and eye-catching were the posters regarding various activities of Shaastra?
Experience of Night ambience and Tech ambience
Rate the Shaastra teasers/videos
Overall ambience of Shaastra
ENTREPRENEURSHIP CONFLUENCE FEEDBACK
How enriching, informative and relevant to the topic were the panel discussions according to you?
Was the time to transition from one panel discussion to other sufficient?
How engaging were the filler events? (Psychometric tests, documentary )
Rate your overall experience of the confluence
Sponsorship Lecture FEEDBACK
1. How was the general conduct and organization of the lecture?
2. Did you have an overview of the sponsor’s activities?
3. Rate the lecture under the following heads:
" i) Clarity of ideas and informativeness "
ii) Duration
4. Did the lecture keep you engaged?
5. Overall event experience
SPONSORSHIP COMPANY FEEDBACK
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. How would you rate the pricing of our Sponsorship Avenues?
3. Did the level of exposure, recognition and value received at the event match your expectations?
4. How would you rate the effectiveness of the following deliverables? (wherever applicable)
" i. Title Association"
ii. Lecture Slot
iii. Stall
iv. Branding and Visibility at Shows
v. Branding and Visibility at one or more events
vi. On Ground Publicity: Banners, Standees and merchandise
vii. Banner and Profile on website
viii. Web-based Publicity: Facebook page, Blog
ix. Newspaper publications
5. How satisfied were you with your association with Shaastra?
LECTURE SPEAKERS FEEDBACK FORM
Were you contacted well in advance
Was the lecture attended by the right audience
Audience response
Rate the General arrangements made for you
Shaastra Experience
PRIZE AND PRIZE MONEY FEEDBACK
Rate the system of dispatch of prize money.
How suitable is giving cheques for prize money?
How suitable would it be to give prize money through online transaction?
Rate the amount of prize money of the competition.
Arrangement at the PPM desk.
CATERING FEEDBACK
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. Did the quality of food served match your expectations?
3. How satisfied were you with our menu?
4. How would you rate affordability of our servings?
5. How satisfied were you with the quantity served for money paid?
6. How comfortable was environment for eating?
7. Availability of miscellaneous requirements(like dustbins, napkins etc)
GENERAL FACILITIES FEEDBACK
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. Were all requirements available on time before event started?
3. How was the quality of the instruments provided?
4. Were those requirements in proper working conditions and user friendly?
5. How well informed were you about the facilities available?
6. How will you rate facilities overall during Shaastra 2015?
TRANSPORTATION FEEDBACK
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. Were vehicles available on time?
3. How comfortable was your journey?
4. How much affordable was the transportation facility?
5. How well informed were you about the facilities available?
6. How will you rate transportation overall in Shaastra 2015?
VIP CARE FEEDBACK
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. Did the quality of your stay meet your expectations?
3. How clear information you had about your event?
4. How was the timings of your food servings?
5. Were you given enough attention before and after the event?

5. Overall event experience
